title: Burton School District Download
text: By registering you become a member of the CBS Interactive family of sites and you have read and agree to the Terms of Use Privacy Policy and Video Services Policy . description: The official Burton Elementary app gives you a personalized window into what is happening at the district and schools. Get the news and info
